column4: hi .. i need help with networking .. how do i connect via my wifi network and share files from my ubuntu desktop ?? on my mac it shows connected as guest when i click the ubuntu computer but i cant share files .. it shows nothing there
can you guys read my messages?? do i need voice or something to be in this room ?
We see you fine. More likely is that no one at this moment is here which knows the answer to your particular question
You could also look at post 5 here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=347019 to do it in native Apple networking fashion instead of Samba method
